entry.title: Russian Forces Expand Control of Strategic City Severodonetsk
entry.content: In a scenario similar to the battle for Mariupol, a large number of Ukrainian troops in Severodonetsk are holding out near the cityâ€™s Azot chemical plant, but reinforcements have been effectively cut off.

entry.title: Ukraine Fears Defeat in East Without Surge in Military Aid
entry.content: Russia is advancing in the Donbas region as the U.S. and its allies prepare to discuss new heavy-weapons supplies for Kyiv.
